name: Klee
description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

skillTalents.name: Kaboom!
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Hỏa DMG.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals Hỏa DMG to enemies after a short casting time.
Nhảy Dậm
Gathering the power of Hỏa, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hỏa DMG upon impact with the ground.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skillTalents.description:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!

When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Hỏa DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.

The mines will explode upon contact with enemies, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Hỏa DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.

skillTalents.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skillTalents.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the Thời Gian Kéo Dài of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby enemies, dealing AoE Hỏa DMG.

passiveTalents.name: Pounding Surprise
passiveTalents.description: When Jumpy Dumpty and Tấn công thườngs deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Trọng Kích, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passiveTalents.name: Sparkling Burst
passiveTalents.description: When a Trọng Kích results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passiveTalents.name: All Of My Treasures!
passiveTalents.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reaction
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon a spark that bombards enemies, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases enemy DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the Thời Gian Kéo Dài of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Hỏa DMG.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain 10% Hỏa DMG Bonus for 25s.
